Citing
==========
.. _citing:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :hidden:

The QOCO paper is in preparation. If you find QOCO useful in the meantime please use the following citation

.. code:: latex

   @misc{chari2025qoco,
      author = {Chari, Govind M. and Acikmese, Behcet},
      title = {QOCO},
      year = {2025},
      publisher = {GitHub},
      journal = {GitHub repository},
      howpublished = {\url{https://github.com/qoco-org/qoco}},
   }
